title: Trump to order National Guard deployment to border with Mexico
text:
Trump to order National Guard deployment to border with Mexico Published 40 Mins Ago Reuters Charles Ommanney | Getty Images A U.S. border patrol agent on the U.S. and Mexico border near Sunland Park, New Mexico. 
President Donald Trump will sign a proclamation on Wednesday ordering the deployment of the National Guard to help protect the border with Mexico , Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen said. 
"The president has directed that the Department of Defense and the Department of Homeland Security work together with our governors to deploy the National Guard to our southwest border to assist the Border Patrol," Nielsen said at a White House briefing. 
"The president will be signing a proclamation to that effect today," she said.
